select
        rt1_0.id,
        rt1_0.created_at,
        rt1_0.expires_at,
        rt1_0.ip_address,
        rt1_0.replaced_by,
        rt1_0.revoked_at,
        rt1_0.token_hash,
        rt1_0.user_id,
        rt1_0.user_agent 
    from
        refresh_tokens rt1_0 
    where
        rt1_0.token_hash=?

select

insert 
    into
        refresh_tokens
        (created_at, expires_at, ip_address, replaced_by, revoked_at, token_hash, user_id, user_agent, id) 
    values
        (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

update
        refresh_tokens 
    set
        expires_at=?,
        ip_address=?,
        replaced_by=?,
        revoked_at=?,
        token_hash=?,
        user_id=?,
        user_agent=? 
    where
        id=?
